query:
UPDATE color_schemes SET 
  primaryColor = '#d4a574',
  secondaryColor = '#b8935f',
  accentColor = '#fff9f0',
  accentDarkColor = '#ffe8cc',
  backgroundColor = '#fffbf5',
  secondaryLightColor = '#fff3e0',
  isDark = 0
WHERE slug = 'black-friday';
command:
